name: Defender_Buff.Thermal_Radiation
display_help: You have the ability to control heat and Thermal Radiation. This allows you to protect allies from harm, heal them or increase their abilities. You can also weaken your enemies.

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Thermal_Radiation.Warmth
powers.display_help: You can use your Warmth to heal some of your wounds, and the wounds of your group. This power has a small radius, so your allies need to be near you if they wish to be affected. Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Thermal_Radiation.Fire_Shield
powers.display_help: Casts a Thermal Shield on one of your allies and grants them damage resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Thermal Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. You cannot stack multiple Thermal Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Plasma Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage for 4m 0s on target
10.00% resistance to cold damage for 4m 0s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Thermal_Radiation.Cauterize
powers.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally by cauterizing their wounds. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Thermal_Radiation.Plasma_Shield
powers.display_help: Envelope an ally in pure plasma. The Plasma Shield gives your ally resistance to Energy, Negative Energy, and Fire damage. You cannot stack multiple Plasma Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Fire Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 20.00% resistance to fire damage, energy damage, negative energy damage for 4m 0s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Thermal_Radiation.Power_of_the_Phoenix
powers.display_help: Revives a fallen ally. The fiery resurrection blasts nearby foes with an explosion and knocks them down and Disorients them. Your ally will revive with most of their Hit Points and Endurance. They will also be invulnerable for a brief time, as well as protected from XPDebt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 1 ticks of 712.15 heal for 0.5s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Thermal_Radiation.Thaw
powers.display_help: Warms an ally and frees them from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Slow and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Thaw also grants the target some resistance to Cold damage. Some of the effects of this power will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Cold, Slow)

display_info: -13.0 hold protection, immobilize protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 1m 30s on target
216.25% resistance to sleep for 1m 30s on target
-13.0 confuse protection, terrorize protection for 1m 30s on target
129.75% resistance to confuse, terrorize, hold, immobilize, stun for 1m 30s on target
346.00% resistance to sleep for 1m 30s on target
10.00% resistance to cold damage for 1m 30s on target
80.00% resistance to run speed debuff, recharge debuff for 1m 30s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Thermal_Radiation.Forge
powers.display_help: Forge a single ally target into a killing machine. Forge immensely enhances a single ally's Damage and chance to hit. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 50.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 2m 0s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Thermal_Radiation.Heat_Exhaustion
powers.display_help: Overwhelm a single foe with waves of exhausting heat. The initial effect will drain the target of some Endurance, but the heat is so overwhelming that the affected target will be weakened. Their Damage output, Endurance Recovery and Hit Point Regeneration will all be reduced. Recharge: Long

display_info: -62.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 40s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Thermal_Radiation.Melt_Armor
powers.display_help: The searing heat from this power is enough to melt the armor and defenses of all targets in the affected area. Melt Armor significantly weakens the Defense and Damage Resistance of the affected targets. Recharge: Long

display_info: -25.00% strength to defense for 40s on target
-30.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 40s on target
